text.text: The claims package is approximately 5 kilometres north west of Power Metal's West Joe Dyke and Main Dyke where high-grade drill results have been reported.
Lithium, Tantalum, and Cesium are all part of the Critical metals list where governments are investing heavily, and demand is set to increase as new technologies use these metals.
Rail infrastructure in place to ship ore, highly skilled labour market from long history of mining operations in the region, power and water connections secure, reliable and cost efficient.
Canada's and Ontario's Critical Metals strategy perfectly coincides with the company strategy of developing a Lithium-Cesium-Tantalum resource close to multiple producing mines.
